member.name: T:Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.FlowDiagrams.DecisionNode
member.summary: A representing a decision in a .

member.name: M:Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.FlowDiagrams.DecisionNode.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.FlowDiagrams.DecisionNode.CanOriginateNewConnections
member.summary: Returns true if there are at least two outbound connection points available. Returns false if there is only one available. This ensures that one side of this DecisionNode is available for a connection to enter this node. That is, a DescisionNode can not be fully taken up by outgoing connections, it must have at least one connection leading into it or the flow chart diagram wouldn't be 'valid'.

member.name: P:Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.FlowDiagrams.DecisionNode.CanReceiveNewConnections
member.summary: Returns true. objects can accept any number of incomming connections.

member.name: T:Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.FlowDiagrams.FlowDiagramConnectionBuilder
member.summary: A type of that can build objects between two objects and add them to a .

member.name: M:Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.FlowDiagrams.FlowDiagramConnectionBuilder.CreateConnection(Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.Foundation.IDiagramModel,Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.Foundation.IDiagramConnectionPoint,Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.Foundation.IDiagramConnectionPoint)
member.summary: Constructs a new between the two given objects and adds it to the given . If the new connection is originating from a , then this method will also set its Data property by looking at the other connections comming from the node and predicting what the label should be. This method can identify and predict (Yes, No, Maybe), (Y, N), (True, False), and (T, F) in both upper and lower case. If no appropriate label can be predicted, then the Data will be set to be a number following the text "Decision".
member.param: The that the new will be added to.
The that is to be the start of the created connection.
The that is to be the end of the created connection.

member.name: M:Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.FlowDiagrams.FlowDiagramConnectionBuilder.CanCreateConnection(Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.Foundation.IDiagramModel,Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.Foundation.IDiagramConnectionPoint,Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.Foundation.ConnectionDropTarget)
member.summary: This method can be overriden to provide additional logic for allowing a connection to be made between the given connection point and destination. This implementation always returns true.
member.param: The that the connection will belong to.
The that represents the start of the connection.
Information about the potential destination of the connection.
member.returns: Whether or not a connection can be made.

member.name: P:Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.FlowDiagrams.FlowDiagramConnectionPoint.CanOriginateNewConnections
member.summary: Gets whether this can originate new connections. This will be true if this connection point currently has no connections attached to it, and the diagram node can also originate new connections.

member.name: P:Mindscape.WpfDiagramming.FlowDiagrams.FlowDiagramConnectionPoint.CanReceiveNewConnections
member.summary: Gets whether this can recieve new connections. This will be true if this connection point does not currently have any outbound connections.
